availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: David B. Sanders (Livingston County, Kentucky, physician.)

body.p: Livingston County, Kentucky, physician. Kentucky native. Married to Jane W. Lillard Sanders. Father of David Sanders, William Sanders, Irene Sanders Webb, Lizzie J Sanders, and Katie Sanders Ruby. Physician in Livingston County in 1860. Owned thirty enslaved persons in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Livingston County, Smithland, p. 283
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Livingston County, Smithland, p. 365A.
Dr. David B. Sanders (March 10, 1807-August 4, 1867), Find A Grave, Memorial #73784178, August 8, 2019, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/73784178.
